dcterms:description: A dataset of whole slide images (WSIs) of low grade gliomas representative of its three major genomic subtypes, including IDH mutations and IDH Wild Type cases, used for training diffusion probabilistic models to synthesize histopathology images.
dcterms:title: Low Grade Glioma (LGG) Dataset

dcterms:description: A comprehensive dataset used for integrative genomic analysis of diffuse lower-grade gliomas, providing genomic data that supports the classification and understanding of glioma subtypes.
dcterms:title: Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA)
